package.name: xpp_hyq
package.description:
HyQ-robot specific functions for visualization in the XPP Motion Framework.
These include inverse kinematics as well as urdf files for a one-legged, two-legged and four legged robot with HyQ legs.
The dynamic model can be found here.
See also IIT.
package.author: Alexander W. Winkler
Diego Pardo.
Carlos Mastalli
Ioannis Havoutis
